author: adityapatwardhan
body:
OpenCover PS Module helps is collecting Code Coverage using the OpenCover
toolset. The module helps in comparing two code coverage runs as well. 

Contributions from @JamesWTruher  as well.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@adityapatwardhan**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution!

It looks like you're a Microsoft contributor (Aditya Patwardhan). If you're full-time, we DON'T require a Contribution License Agreement. If you are a vendor, please DO sign the electronic Contribution License Agreement. It will take 2 minutes and there's no faxing! https://cla.microsoft.com.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: git thinks test/tools/OpenCover/OpenCover.psd1 is a binary file - can you make sure the file is ascii?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @lzybkr @JamesWTruher I have pushed a change to address comments.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Please hold off the review. I will update this module so that it supports Powershell v4.0.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @lzybkr @JamesWTruher The module is ready for review now.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@lzybkr @JamesWTruher @andschwa This PR is ready for review again. I have added CodeCoverage as an configuration for Start-PSBuild. This is done as we need debugType as Full for OpenCover.

Appveyor.psm1 is updated for generating daily builds for CodeCoverage configuration and publishing them as a zip file.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @lzybkr @andschwa Updated with addressing code review comments.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @daxian-dbw @lzybkr Addressed code review comments and merge conflict.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @daxian-dbw Fixed end of file newline issue.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @lzybkr Can you have a look? I have addressed your concerns.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @lzybkr Added command lookup as suggested. Please have a look.

title: Add OpenCover PS Module to collect code coverage
